stimulusHtml: Which of the following terms best describes this species?

features.html: The Venus flytrap is a carnivorous plant that grows best in nutrient-poor, acidic soil. They typically grow in certain longleaf pine savanna ecosystems in the Carolinas.

choicesHtml: A keystone species, because it is carnivorous.
A generalist species, because it is advantaged in changing habitats.
An invasive species, because it competes with other plants for water and sunlight.
A specialist species, because it thrives only in soils with low \(pH\) and nutrient levels.
